Posts.Content: Ladies that are depressed please see a doctor in behavioral medicine and try an anti depressant. It is very Common to have these feelings but there is help out there . Very difficult to go through all this by Yourself, u need help. Talk therapy helps see an oncology therapist most cancer centers have them , seek out the help u need. U will be fine, meds are. Helping many people with this disease. U may need a referral So ask your oncologist. Good luck
Posts.Title: Depression..

Posts.Content: My onc. Says xgeva every 3 months is sufficient.
Posts.Title: Any input would help

Posts.Content: Been on it forfouryears, I've been stable. I have fatigue., my hair is like wire, some joint pain mostly from letrozole., other than that it's tolerable. Good. Luck.
Posts.Title: Ibrance and letrozole combo

Posts.Content: I have wire hair, annoying, I use argan oil shampoo, mask treatment, and conditioner. Nick Chavez on QVC Has a Velvet mesquite serum. I use it after shampoo and dry too, it calmes down the frizzies A couple Of drops in your hands and put through your hair. It's not going to cure it,wire, but it will allow u to style And not look like you're wired. Ha. It's one of the side effects we have to put up with, but it's a small Inconvenience. There are other SE that are much worse. Iv'e thought about straightening it but it would Be a huge commitment. Mine is getting thin too, in the past I had thick hair, now thin. Very sad. Good luck.p.s. On Amazon there are many shampoos for thinning hair, check on this.
Posts.Title: Ibrance and letrozole combo
